dcterms:description: The dataset refers to the use of Angle Diversity Transmitters (ADTs) and Angle Diversity Receivers (ADRs) in data centers for uplink communication, achieving high data rates and improved performance through spatial multiplexing.
dcterms:title: Angle Diversity Transmitters and Receivers

dcterms:description: The dataset refers to the use of Wide Field-of-View Receivers (WFOVRs) in data centers, which collect higher optical signal power but also more noise and interference.
dcterms:title: Wide Field-of-View Receivers

dcterms:creator: N. Hamedazimi
H. Gupta
V. Sekar
S. R. Das
dcterms:description: FireFly is a reconfigurable wireless data center fabric using free-space optics, designed to improve connectivity and reduce cabling in data centers.
dcterms:title: FireFly

dcterms:creator: O. Z. Alsulami
M. O. Musa
M. T. Alresheedi
J. M. Elmirghani
dcterms:description: This dataset covers visible light optical data center links, focusing on the performance and design of optical wireless communication systems in data centers.
dcterms:title: Visible Light Optical Data Centre Links

dcterms:creator: O. Z. Alsulami
S. O. Saeed
S. H. Mohamed
T. El-Gorashi
M. T. Alresheedi
J. M. Elmirghani
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses a data center optical wireless downlink with Wavelength Division Multiplexing (WDM) and multi-access point support, enhancing communication capabilities in data centers.
dcterms:title: Data Centre Optical Wireless Downlink with WDM

dcterms:creator: A. S. Alhazmi
O. Z. Alsulami
T. E. H. El-Gorashi
M. T. Alresheedi
J. M. H. Elmirghani
dcterms:description: This dataset covers the design and performance of optical wireless uplinks from data center top of rack switches to multiple spine switches, focusing on enhancing data transmission efficiency.
dcterms:title: Data Center Top of Rack Switch to Multiple Spine Switches Optical Wireless Uplinks

dcterms:description: The dataset refers to the use of Red, Yellow, Green, and Blue (RYGB) Laser Diodes (LDs) in data centers for downlink communication, focusing on achieving high data rates.
dcterms:title: Red, Yellow, Green, and Blue Laser Diodes

dcterms:description: The dataset refers to a 50-pixel imaging receiver (ImR) used in data centers for downlink communication, focusing on performance metrics such as delay spread and Signal-to-Noise Ratio (SNR).
dcterms:title: 50-Pixel Imaging Receiver

dcterms:description: The dataset refers to a 3-branch Angle Diversity Receiver (ADR) used in data centers for downlink communication, focusing on its performance in terms of SNR and data rates.
dcterms:title: 3-Branch Angle Diversity Receiver
